TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BinaryKeyIdentifierClause
Public NotInheritable Class EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause Inherits BinaryKeyIdentifierClause

summary.span: 表示标识加密密钥的密钥标识符子句。

span.span: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies an encrypted key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非创建自定义安全令牌服务，否则，通常不需要使用 。Typically, the does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 当安全令牌服务返回安全令牌时，已颁发的安全令牌包含对附加的和未附加的安全令牌的引用。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens. 附加引用是指包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌，而未附加引用则是未包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 这些引用通常确认已颁发的安全令牌的真实性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. 使用 类可引用加密密钥。Use the class to reference an encrypted key. 方法返回加密密钥。The method returns the encrypted key. WCF 接受格式正确的已打包密钥，这些密钥在格式上是正确的。WCF accepts wrapped keys that are well formed with respect to the wire format. 接受并使用在网络上指定的密钥换行算法。The key wrap algorithm specified on the wire is accepted and used. 未验证该算法与终结点指定的 的兼容性。It is not verified to be compatible with the specified by the endpoint.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 `derivationNonce` 和 `derivationLength` 参数，则会使用隐含的派生密钥，而不是令牌的直接安全密钥。When the `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are specified the implied derived key is used instead of the direct security key of the token. 使用 中的静态常数字符串指定 `encryptionMethod` 参数的加密算法。Use the static constant strings in the to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.

span.span: A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性序列化为 XML 时，它将放置在元素中 `` 。When the property is serialized into XML, it is placed in the `` element. 对于加密密钥， `` 元素是一个可选元素，它将用户可读名称与密钥值相关联。For encrypted keys, the `` element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value. 然后，可以使用此名称通过 `` 元素中的元素引用密钥 `` 。This name can then be used to reference the key using the `` element within the `` element. ``与 ID 值不同，相同的元素值可以在单个文档中多次出现。The same `` element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document. 在 `` XML 文档中用同一名称标识的所有元素中，该键的值必须相同 `` 。The value of the key must be the same in all `` elements identified with the same `` name within an XML document.
